import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import {createStructuredSelector} from "reselect"; import { selectCartTotal } from "../../redux/cart/cart.selector"; import "./checkout.styles.scss" const CheckoutPage = ({total}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
TOTAL: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ total:selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
